title: Infinite Loop Detected
description: This is a bug description for an infinite loop issue.

title: UI Alignment Issue
description: The buttons are not aligned properly on the page.

title: Data Loss Bug
description: Saving the document causes data loss in certain scenarios.

title: Authentication Error
description: Users are unable to log in due to an authentication error.

title: 404 Page Not Found
description: Navigating to a specific URL results in a 404 error.

title: Crash on Startup
description: The application crashes immediately after startup.

title: Performance Degradation
description: The system experiences slowdowns under heavy load.

title: Missing Feature
description: A crucial feature is missing from the application.

title: Security Vulnerability
description: The application has a security vulnerability that needs to be addressed.

title: Compatibility Issue
description: The application is not compatible with the latest browser version.
